org.xchain.framework.security

Class IdentityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.security.IdentityManager

  • @LifecycleClass(uri="http://www.xchain.org/security/1.0")
public class IdentityManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The IdentityManager contains a service that stores the authenticated Identity of the user of the application. Services are stored per thread because the "user" of the application might change, as thread such as quartz will interact as a different Identity.
    Author:
    Jason Rose, Christian Trimble

      • getPrincipalName

public java.lang.String getPrincipalName()
